content_descriptors.notes:
Pixelated blood and gore.
Strong language.
Torture.
Satanism/Occultism references.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 2.2GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • OS *: Windows 7

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
